page.title: 04THE HUDSON SPORTS CENTRE.
page.content: An important amenity in the town is the Hudson Sports Centre opened in 1971 and run by the County and Local Authority.The centre has a swimming pool facility which includes a beginners pool.In the main hall people may play: football,hockey,basketball,tennis, netball,badminton,table-tennis and rollerskating.There is also a weight-training room and a sauna.Outside there are facilities for tennis and athletics.Every summer holiday the centre organises a programme of events for the young these range from trampolining to karate.Every month the centre has a roller-disco or a normal disco. The next page carries the results of a survey on the use of the Centre by Wisbech people.
